name: Inflatality
description: The definitive derpy physics based fighter featuring adorable inflatable wavers beating the crap out of each other!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Core 2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: SM3 512MB VRAM Storage: 1 GB available space Additional Notes: Requires Game Controllers
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: SM4 1GB VRAM Additional Notes: Requires Game Controllers
